participant_1.background:
I think my pets are the best things in my life.
I enjoy swimming, hiking, and spending time with my family.
i love to surf.
I've spent way too much money on gummy worms.
I rode my motorcycle across the country.

participant_2.background:
After a long day of creating websites, I like to go for a run to clear my head.
I watch Rick and Morty when my parents are not home because they don't approve of it.
I remember feeling safe and loved when my mom would take me to the park.
I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots.
I love spending time with my pets and they bring me so much joy.

content.text: I'm a big fan of Rick and Morty. What's your favorite episode?
I like the Pickle Rick episode. It's so funny. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to surf. I've even ridden my motorcycle across the country. How about you?
I like to create websites. It's really fun to be able to design something and then see people using it.
That's awesome! I don't have the patience for that kind of thing.
It takes a lot of time and effort, but it's worth it when you see the finished product.
I bet. I'm more of a hands-on kind of person. I like to be outside and active.
I like that too! I love going for walks in the park.
Me too! I also like to hike and swim.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm not much of a swimmer, but I love hiking.
We should go hiking together sometime.
That would be great! I'd love to.
Awesome! I'll let you know when I'm free.
